Thread hh/945

Attila Nagy margitka: improved gitk for the Hk-style workflow [git] <hh/945> <root> (2009-11-17) 
I hacked a bit on gitk to create margitka, an improved version that
displays the commit's topic in a separate column. This can be useful
when looking at a long line of development to get an overall idea on
the work done.

You can get it at:

http://github.com/attish/margitka
